segment.source: Use pop-up animations to show and hide pop-up UI for flyouts or custom pop-up UI elements.
segment.target: Use pop-up animations to show and hide pop-up UI for flyouts or custom pop-up UI elements.

segment.source: Pop-up elements are containers that appear over the app's content and are dismissed if the user taps or clicks outside of the pop-up element.
segment.target: Pop-up elements are containers that appear over the app's content and are dismissed if the user taps or clicks outside of the pop-up element.

segment.source: Pop-up UI animations in UWP apps
segment.target: Pop-up UI animations in UWP apps

segment.source: Use pop-up animations to show and hide pop-up UI for flyouts or custom pop-up UI elements.
segment.target: Use pop-up animations to show and hide pop-up UI for flyouts or custom pop-up UI elements.

segment.source: Pop-up elements are containers that appear over the app's content and are dismissed if the user taps or clicks outside of the pop-up element.
segment.target: Pop-up elements are containers that appear over the app's content and are dismissed if the user taps or clicks outside of the pop-up element.

segment.source: Use pop-up animations to show or hide custom pop-up UI elements that aren't a part of the app page itself.
segment.target: Use pop-up animations to show or hide custom pop-up UI elements that aren't a part of the app page itself.

segment.source: The common controls provided by Windows already have these animations built in.
segment.target: The common controls provided by Windows already have these animations built in.

segment.source: Don't use pop-up animations for tooltips or dialogs.
segment.target: Don't use pop-up animations for tooltips or dialogs.

segment.source: Don't use pop-up animations to show or hide UI within the main content of your app; only use pop-up animations to show or hide a pop-up container that displays on top of the main app content.
segment.target: Don't use pop-up animations to show or hide UI within the main content of your app; only use pop-up animations to show or hide a pop-up container that displays on top of the main app content.

segment.source: Quickstart: Animating your UI using library animations
segment.target: Quickstart: Animating your UI using library animations
